name: patron (itch)
description:
[has performance issues and bugs on slower hardware]

Tend a bar of lonely patrons...

Match the negative emotion colours with the corresponding drinks (hint: do the opposite for special customers).

space - pause

"m" - mute

Made over the course of a week, for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2

Created by: PsychoWren

Art by: prouwu, https://www.artstation.com/isabellealderson
